title: What are some 'hard to swallow' facts about BTS? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here’s my unfiltered opinion- if you disagree then write your own. I personally think they’re very talented individuals who are bound by their contracts which waters down their artistic talent. EDIT: SOME of the replies to this comment are exactly what you expect from Army. If you wonder why people dislike our fandom here’s a great example. You can’t let others have their own opinion and will defend BTS to your dying breath and invalidate everyone’s thoughts as long as they don’t align with yours. I’m not sure which part of opinion are people not getting, really? Your replies are just your own opinions vs mine, and we’re not here to argue over this. The question is hard to swallow, which is clear because some people just CAN’T be mature and accept that not everyone will agree with you. Jesus. LONG POST AHEAD** 1- They are grateful for their fans but they don’t love them and think about them all the time. It’s part of their training to say these things so it comes out naturally now. 2- All their recent albums are lower in quality because BH is choosing mainstream to sell instead of songs that fit their vocals and style. This can be noticed in most of their latest album solo songs. 3- All their collabs don’t fit their style. 4- RUN episodes are very childish and hard to watch, especially when you remember their age. If I were BTS I’d fucking hate my job. 5- They hate most of the things they do however they’re bound by contracts. 6- They don’t have freedom as much as their fans would like to delude themselves. They can’t even release songs without approval, they can’t decide concepts without approval, they can’t do solo stuff without approval(IF any approved..), they can’t go live or post without approval. They’re monitored all the damn time, hence my next point. 7- I believe some members regret signing BH but are now stuck in their comfort zone. They could have achieved similar success with less demanding contracts. 8- I believe some members would love to go solo but are too scared of the backlash and how their career will go from there. This is not because they don’t like the members or BTS as a band.. no no. I believe this is because they’re constricted and have no opportunities outside of this damn band. Not fair to all of them. 9- They’re most probably in serious relationships. 10-Their public image doesn’t reflect their real life personality. I believe KPOP artist in general are the most well hidden from their fandom. 11- I believe the members don’t hang out as much as they used to. Please don’t confuse this with them not being friends anymore, because I believe they’re genuine friends and love each other. They just grew up which is something their fans hate to admit. 12- Controversial.. I believe Tae willingly distanced himself from Jimin and JK (on camera) as he doesn’t want to be involved in ship wars. I believe recently Taehyung in specific want people to know him for his talent only rather than looks and shipping. 13- Speaking of Tae, he is definitely one of the members that has had enough with all the bullshit and can’t put on a face anymore. This is very clear from how he wants people to know him for his talent, and how he tries to do all his Vlives alone speaking his mind (as much as he can). It’s very clear how much he didn’t like his live with JK and I believe because they were forced to do that the ridiculous paper shit(don’t know what that was) 14-Their support to BLM was due to public backlash and not because they support the movement. Why? because they’re not affected and can’t relate. It has nothing to do with them being racists. 15-Some members are clearly favored over others, like Jimin and JK. 16- They’re ALL not getting paid enough. They’re getting nothing compared to how much they sell. 17- Army fandom is toxic and have different categories -The entitled and aggressive ones that when bored will even attack the members themselves if they dare breathe -The blind followers who will not hold the boys accountable for anything they do and treat them like 5 yo babies who they must “protect” -The “omg look how smol or tiny” ones.. yeah I mentioned them -The INSANE Tae/JK/JM Solo stans and shippers.. those are a breed of their own. They literally fight each other all the time and send the members death threats. 18- BTS will not last, and it will start falling once the members go to military especially JK/JM/Tae. All I wish for is the members being more honest and showing their true thoughts and feelings to their fans. I want to hear music they truly want to produce without any interference. I want to know the artist I support and not the fake image their company presents.

edit: before you go on reading this, if you’re a sensitive army and can’t stand a word against bts, then please don’t bother reading. some of the comments under this answer made me add this. they’re they don’t suffer financially but becoming a kpop idol isn’t an easy job even if you’re from big 3. an ex: bigbang debuted when yg was a small company and they had to suffer as well. bts isn’t the (not all of it, there are good people in the fandom as well). i followed a bunch of bts stan accounts on twitter and had to unfollow them after a week because of how cringy they were. i saw tweets like “i got two holes for a reason: for jungkook and taehyung” i got second hand embarrassment and felt disgusted. also if you speak anything honest about bts/disagree on something or say something nice about any other group, you are bullied and called an anti.some of the bts members are atheists. they don’t have a religion. RM said he is an atheist and taehyung said that he has no religion during bts festa 2019 (starting from 00:42:50). i am not sure about other members because i couldn’t find any proof.suga using a sample of jim jones’ speech in one of his songs on his mixtape is insensitive. hear me out on this one, i love yoongi and i think he probably added it without any research. if you don’t know, jim jones was a cult leader who led his followers into a mass suicide (practically murder because they had no idea about it) in which more than 900 people died and is known as Jonestown Massacre. yoongi should have never used a highly controversial political person for his song considering how sensitive this topic is and how big of a fanbase he has.bighit is becoming more money hungry as bts is reaching more success.they don’t live together anymore. they have their own lives and their own families when they are not at work.these are facts/opinions about bts and army. i can only think of these right now. if i think of more i’ll add them.
